laws about child being in the appropriate seats but am curious if anyone knows the laws usa about child not being restrained while the car is moving hoping someone else out there has dealt with something similar and can provide little advice thank you no no no do not do this if you get in an accident there an almost zero chance your lo isn going to go flying out of your arms like torpedo there was an accident in our area few months ago where woman car broke down so she pulled over into the shoulder on the highway she was alone with her 10mo lo and he was fussy so she got in the backseat and got him out of his car seat while she was waiting for help someone rear ended her and her lo went flying through window and didn make it sorry to be graphic just can stress enough how this is such bad idea if you re in car your lo needs to be in the car seat yes that is my fear to me if anything were to happen would be the one at fault not my husband and could never love with myself and something is always safe until the one time it is my lo is worth risking this is very very illegal for good reason but another thing if your husband is so averse to reason and freaks out about his own baby crying in the car not to mention is verbally abusive to you think there probably further problems you need to address with him and good therapist this is totally illegal but much more importantly totally dangerous you re asking earnestly what could go wrong but how is that not supremely obvious you get in an accident and baby is unrestrained baby goes flying your husband sounds like bully laws are state dependent as an example here california link https www ots ca gov child passenger safety asp minimum fine 475 above 1000 for subsequent offense not to mention the already mentioned likelihood that your baby won make it if you re in an accident my advice tell your husband his choices are either listen to her fuss or mourn her death just be blunt your child could die if she is not properly fastened in car seat in collision many children have died this is never safe even minor accident could be deadly or cause serious injuries if you were holding her if people can see into your car you can bet that someone will call 911 when things are calm can you talk to your husband about his temper is this new behavior does he agree that it problem suggest going with him into fire station pointing at him and saying hey so my husband keeps telling me to take the baby out of the car seat while we re on the highway just make sure not to wear anything you care about because it will be *bloodbath* not safe but understand never took the kids out of their car seats but have sat at reeeeaaaally awkward angle so they could nurse for just moment to get them to relax where the car has been demolished and the seat is literally laying on the floor but the kiddo is ok leave baby in the car seat show him our responses if he still doubter or swing by your local police leaving good friends wedding think it should only when absolutely necessary fussing is apart of baby and relate to wanting to get in the back seat to comfort but the reality is they will more likely take nap of your not there in my state it is legal to remove the infant to breastfeed car seat tech here an equation learned during training and it really put things into perspective restraining forces weight speed so if you are going 10mph with 10lb object and get into an accident it takes 100lbs of force to keep that object from moving putting this into realistic terms going 50 mph with 20 lb baby it takes 000lbs of restraining forces to keep that baby in place not humanly possible not to mention that baby now becomes projectile that could harm other people in the vehicle you can easily amp convince op to do it therapy is happening soon appreciate the support when desperate usually undo my own seatbelt unclip my bra lean over the car seat and nurse lo know it unsafe for me but rather home life for anyone else highly encourage thinking this part of life with him through will he go to therapy would he be willing to change his behaviour or even admit it problem would you the baby be safe if he felt challenged questioned constrained frustrated etc whether or not you feel there is any risk please consider talking to counselor for yourself and then be utterly honest with them once bank account utterly separate from any household family accounts do say these things to cast aspersions on your husband nor lightly they are the most essential starting points for any person living with someone capable of unpredictable anger in everyday situations wish you luck and fortitude in navigating this may you and yours be kept safe couples therapy at least standard couples therapy is not recommended in relationship with emotional abuse because it can become another path for the abuser to gaslight and belittle the victim it very easy for your husband to deny what he did and cast you as the liar delusional manipulative etc unless your husband is very self aware and penitent about his anger issues would try individual therapy first it sounds like you ve got two babies on your
